excerpt: "Microsoft says many of its Xbox safety systems are now powered by Community Sift, a moderation tool created by Microsoft subsidiary TwoHat. Among the \"billions of human interactions\" the Community Sift system has filtered this year are \"over 36 million\" Xbox player reports in 22 languages,"
